title: 67: Alex Murdaugh Bond Hearing, Alex Pleads Not Guilty
description:
Seton was in the courtroom as Alex Murdaugh plead not guilty to four charges, including the murder of his wife and youngest son. Our legal analyst, John Snyder helps us breakdown want happened. Seton gives us insight on what it was like in the courtroom.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
